name: Cold Carrot-and-Mace Soup with Curried Barbecued Shrimp
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds carrots, peeled and coarsely chopped
1 pound medium shrimps, in the shell
1 teaspoon coarsely ground fresh black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the soup ingredients except the coconut milk and basil in a pot over medium heat. Bring to a boil and simmer for 35 to 45 minutes, until the carrots are tender. Cool. Stir in the coconut milk and place in a blender or food processor and process to make a fine puree. Chill.

Toss together all the salad ingredients and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 to 8 hours, turning occasionally. Grill shrimps over white coals about 6 minutes per side. Cool. Peel and devein the shrimps and slice in half lengthwise.
Ladle the soup into 6 bowls, add a few shrimps and garnish with the minced basil.
